recipesJson.name: Classic
recipesJson.author: fadedjay1
recipesJson.description:
Custard butterscotch graham tobacco.
Super tasty. Dessert tobacco. Day 1 you will have heavy notes of tobacco, graham, and butterscotch. By day 3 the custard takes over and its just silky, custard, butterscotch, tobacco
Tested in the Billet box/xeta/40 watts/rdl-dl

reviews.text: This is right up there with the best tobacco vapes ever, quality inhale, on the exhale, even better.  You have amazed me with this. After 2 weeks it's really shines, tried and tested flavours, but executed to perfection

Tested in Kayfun lite at 19w 400 degrees. This is some seriously good stuff. That FLV tobacco combo is insanely good and by far my favorite tobacco combo I've tried, and it has an awesome base behind it. Thanks for this!
